overview: The 'More Information' page of Digital Experience Healthcare provides a searchable and filterable list of healthcare services. It includes navigation, theme toggle, search input, filter chips, sorting dropdown, and dynamically loaded service cards with skeleton loaders.
key_components: Sticky navigation bar with theme toggle
Search bar with input and icon
Service cards grid with skeleton loaders
interactions: Clicking theme toggle switches between light and dark modes
Typing in search input filters visible service cards
Clicking filter chips filters cards by category
Changing sort dropdown reorders service cards
Skeleton loaders replaced by service cards after data load
data_flow: Frontend script fetches or reveals service data
Search and filter inputs update visible service cards
Sort dropdown changes order based on selected criteria
Theme toggle updates global UI state
accessibility: ARIA labels on navigation and filter groups
Visually hidden labels for search input
Alt text on all service images
analytics: Track search input usage and query terms
Track filter chip clicks and selected categories
test_ideas: Verify skip link focuses main content
Validate theme toggle persists state across reloads
Test search input filters cards by title and description
Test each filter chip shows only matching service cards
Test sort dropdown orders cards alphabetically and by popularity
Confirm skeleton loaders disappear after data load
Check all images have alt text and load lazily
Validate ARIA roles and labels for accessibility compliance
Verify analytics events fire on user interactions
